panels.description: Up/down status for each node in the cluster.
panels.title: Nodes up

panels.description: Up/down status for each database in the cluster.
panels.title: Databases up

panels.description: Up/down status for each shard in the cluster.
panels.title: Shards up

panels.description: Total requests handled by endpoints aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Cluster total requests

panels.description: Total memory used by each across each database in the cluster
panels.title: Cluster total memory used

panels.description: Total connections to each database in the cluster.
panels.title: Cluster total connections

panels.description: Total cluster key count for each database in the cluster.
panels.title: Cluster total keys

panels.description: Ratio of database cache key hits against hits and misses.
panels.title: Cluster cache hit ratio

panels.description: Sum of key evictions and expirations in the cluster by database.
panels.title: Cluster evictions vs expired objects

panels.description: Endpoint request rate for each node in the cluster.
panels.title: Node requests

panels.description: Average latency for each node in the cluster.
panels.title: Node average latency

panels.description: Memory utilization % for each node in the cluster.

targets.expr: (sum(redis_used_memory{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job"}) by (redis_cluster, node, job) / clamp_min(sum(node_available_memory{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job"}) by (redis_cluster,node, job), 1)) * 100

panels.title: Node memory utilization

panels.description: CPU utilization for each node in the cluster.
panels.title: Node CPU utilization

panels.description: Rate of request handled by each database in the cluster.
panels.title: Database operations

panels.description: Average latency for each database in the cluster.
panels.title: Database average latency

panels.description: Calculated memory utilization % for each database in the cluster.

targets.expr: sum(bdb_used_memory{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job"}) by (job, redis_cluster, bdb) / clamp_min(sum(bdb_memory_limit{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job"}) by (job, redis_cluster, bdb), 1) * 100

panels.title: Database memory utilization

panels.description: Calculated cache hit rate for each database in the cluster

targets.expr: sum(bdb_read_hits{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job"}) by (job, redis_cluster, bdb) / clamp_min(sum(bdb_read_hits{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job"}) by (job, redis_cluster, bdb) + sum(bdb_read_misses{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job"}) by (job, redis_cluster, bdb),1) * 100

panels.title: Database cache hit ratio
